articles.title: These Were the Hottest Sectors in 2025. Will They Continue to Be in 2026?
articles.mainIdea: These Were the Hottest Sectors in 2025. Will They Continue to Be in 2026?
articles.summary: Motley Fool: These Were the Hottest Sectors in 2025. Will They Continue to Be in 2026?. Information technology, communications services, and industrials led the pack in 2025. Related tickers mentioned: XLK, ^GSPC.

articles.title: Here's What to Expect From Verizon Communications' Next Earnings Report
articles.mainIdea: Here's What to Expect From Verizon Communications' Next Earnings Report
articles.summary: Barchart: Here's What to Expect From Verizon Communications' Next Earnings Report. Verizon Communications is expected to release its fiscal fourth-quarter earnings next month, and analysts project a single-digit profit drop. Related tickers mentioned: VZ.

articles.title: Here's What to Expect From Netflix's Next Earnings Report

articles.summary: Barchart: Here's What to Expect From Netflix's Next Earnings Report. Netflix is scheduled to announce its fiscal fourth-quarter earnings next month, and analysts project a double-digit profit growth. Related tickers mentioned: NFLX.
